member.summary: Search parameter that represents the user search filter as an array of custom search options.

member.summary: Search parameter that represents the page number. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:ElectronicsStore.WebAPI.Models.Requests.GetGoodsRequestModel.PageSize
member.summary: Search parameter that represents the number of goods on the page. The default value is 10. The maximum value is 100.

member.summary: Search parameter that represents the goods category unique identifier. To ignore the search parameter, the value must be empty.

member.summary: Search parameter that represents the "Price To" price filter value. To ignore the search parameter, the value must be empty.

member.summary: Search parameter that represents the brand filter values as an array of brand names. To ignore the search parameter, the value must be empty.
